import sys

def main():
    answers = [0,0]
    val = 0
    for i in xrange(1,5000):
        val += i*2
        answers.append(val-i)
        answers.append(val)
    t = int(raw_input())
    inp = map(int, sys.stdin.read().split())
    out = ""
    for _ in inp:
        out+=str(answers[_])+"\n"
    print out[:-1]
main()
